summary: The mod adds a rusty iron shields for draugres and skeletons instead of conventional iron shields.
descriptionHtml:
It seems strange that in Skyrim draugres go with \"new\" iron shields, but with ancient weapons. I retekstured Iron shield, making it rusty and painted wood, to match draugr weapons - in a pale green! I think the shields are now more suitable for draugres!

Mod does not replace conventional shields on rusty, but adds a new shield.
author: FuriousFighter
